Package path.wiser.mobile.db

Interface Summary
WiserDatabaseTable A WiserDatabaseTable is an object that encapsulates all the rows of a table or relation.
 

Class Summary
PoiIncedent Helper class to encapsulate the constants and a single record of a database table.
Queryable The Queryable object remembers which record it is displaying and how to find the next one and previous one.
Trace  
WiserDatabase This is the database for all data stored on the device.
WiserDatabase.DatabaseHelper A helper class to manage database creation and version management.
WiserQuery This object houses all the queries you can do with the WiserDatabase.
 

Enum Summary
WiserQuery.QueryType
